page.title: 18A MARKFIELD PIG FARMER.
page.content:
An interview with Factory farmer Mr.Morrel,who farms at 'The Oaks'near the M.1. motorway.
{How does the motorway affect you? You learn to live with it,but when the wind is in the right direction then it is very noisy.I've fitted double glazing to try and cut down the noise. {How do you keep your pigs? The pigs are kept in 70 pens,each pen holding 75-100 animals.They are fattened up then sold. {What changes have there been in {farming over the last 25 years? The factory started almost exactly 25 years ago and there haven't really been any changes since. {How many people work for you? I've got 8 people who work for me and the wage bill for the year comes to 16 000 pounds.
